page.title: 07 Alford's Coaches, Coleford
page.content: On Friday 7th June we went to{Alford's {Coaches.}When we got there the man was on the phone so we had to wait for him. When he came out we went under a coach. Under the coach there was a big pit to go in and see the underneath of the coach. After that we asked the man some questions . The number of their oldest coach on the road is BWD 953J. A new coach costs about{Â£43,000. }Each driver is allowed to drive for four and a half hours without a break and then they have to have a half hour break. The drivers take six schools every day . One of the girls asked, " What is your most embarrassing moment?" and he said,"It's when old people fall down the coach steps". When it was time to go back to school the man said," I will give you a ride up in a coach."
